name: 8 Bit Pool
description:
Feel the thrill of clearing up against your opponent.

Re-live the days of 8 bit computers, graphics & physics.

This is a simple 8 bit pool game.  It was a bit of a side project, mostly as a hidden game in another game which I'm developing.

It has been extended to have multiple 8 bit graphics styles (sorry no Sega Master System).

  • Commodore 64
  • ZX Spectrum
  • Amstrad CPC
  • BBC Micro
  • NES
  • Gameboy

One time low price payment, NO ADS and no data/information collection.

Use a controller or use the keyboard with Q,A,O,P,Space or Arrow keys and left Ctrl.

Available for Windows and Android.

Mac OS X version coming soon.

www.PurpleViking.com
